00033 inline std::ostringstream& Log::Get(TLogLevel level)
00034 {
00035     os << "- " << NowTime();
00036     os << " " << ToString(level) << ": ";
00037     os << std::string(level > logDEBUG ? level - logDEBUG : 0, '\t');
00038     return os;
00039 }
00040 
00041 inline Log::~Log()
00042 {
00043     os << std::endl;
00044     fprintf(stderr, "%s", os.str().c_str());
00045     fflush(stderr);
00046 }

00048 inline TLogLevel& Log::ReportingLevel()
00049 {
00050     static TLogLevel reportingLevel = logDEBUG4;
00051     return reportingLevel;
00052 }

00054 inline std::string Log::ToString(TLogLevel level)
00055 {
00056         static const char* const buffer[] = {"ERROR", "WARNING", "INFO", "DEBUG", "DEBUG1", "DEBUG2", "DEBUG3", "DEBUG4"};
00057     return buffer[level];
00058 }
00059 
00060 inline TLogLevel Log::FromString(const std::string& level)
00061 {
00062     if (level == "DEBUG4")
00063         return logDEBUG4;
00064     if (level == "DEBUG3")
00065         return logDEBUG3;
00066     if (level == "DEBUG2")
00067         return logDEBUG2;
00068     if (level == "DEBUG1")
00069         return logDEBUG1;
00070     if (level == "DEBUG")
00071         return logDEBUG;
00072     if (level == "INFO")
00073         return logINFO;
00074     if (level == "WARNING")
00075         return logWARNING;
00076     if (level == "ERROR")
00077         return logERROR;
00078     Log().Get(logWARNING) << "Unknown logging level '" << level << "'. Using INFO level as default.";
00079     return logINFO;
00080 }

00082 typedef Log FILELog;
00083 
00084 #define FILE_LOG(level) \
00085     if (level > FILELog::ReportingLevel()) ; \
00086     else Log().Get(level)

00092 inline std::string NowTime()
00093 {
00094     const int MAX_LEN = 200;
00095     char buffer[MAX_LEN];
00096     if (GetTimeFormatA(LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT, 0, 0,
00097             "HH':'mm':'ss", buffer, MAX_LEN) == 0)
00098         return "Error in NowTime()";
00099 
00100     char result[100] = {0};
00101     static DWORD first = GetTickCount();
00102     std::sprintf(result, "%s.%03ld", buffer, (long)(GetTickCount() - first) % 1000);
00103     return result;
00104 }
00105 
00106 #else
00107 
00108 #include <sys/time.h>
00109 
00110 inline std::string NowTime()
00111 {
00112     char buffer[11];
00113     time_t t;
00114     time(&t);
00115     tm r = {0};
00116     strftime(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "%X", localtime_r(&t, &r));
00117     struct timeval tv;
00118     gettimeofday(&tv, 0);
00119     char result[100] = {0};
00120     std::sprintf(result, "%s.%03ld", buffer, (long)tv.tv_usec / 1000);
00121     return result;
00122 }
